Formed in anomalies of extreme temperatures. Contains trace amounts of gold.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]LETHAL TEMPO
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Killing stalkers or mutants infuses you with great power for 5 seconds.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] +25% Damage received.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] 1 COPY: %c[ui_gray_2]Increased movement speed.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] 2 COPIES: %c[ui_gray_2]Health regeneration.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] 3 COPIES: %c[ui_gray_2]Slightly recovers a random body part.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] 4 COPIES: %c[ui_gray_2]Slightly recovers a random body part.
 %c[d_cyan] --- %c[pda_white] 5 COPIES: %c[ui_gray_2]+25% damage received debuff removed.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]HIGH VOLTAGE
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Stepping on an Electra anomaly will recharge batteries and active devices.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Stepping on an Electra anomaly also allows infinite sprint for a short period of time.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Having 5 copies allows recharging Exoskeleton batteries.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES %c[pda_white]& %c[ui_red]NO

%c[pda_white]PERK: %c[d_orange]MINOR LACERATIONS
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Your weapon loses 50% damage output but gains the ability to cause bleeding damage.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Bleeding damage is proportional to weapon damage.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Increases the chance for enemies to surrender.
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO
